categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Anna Francolini is an English actress who portrayed the Imperial Emigration Officer Falthina Sharest in the 2018 Anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. She is best known for her theatrical work in such musicals as Company (1995) and Merrily We Roll Along (2001). After pursuing Theatre Studies at Warwick University, Francolini worked on the BBC drama series Jonathan Creek (2003) and the television series Rome (2005). For her role in The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie (2009), she received the TMA Award for Best Performance in a Play.

In 2018, Anna Francolini portrayed the Imperial Emigration Officer Falthina Sharest in Solo: A Star Wars Story. While her character remained unnamed in the film, Sharest was identified by name in Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, the film's accompanying reference book, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
